_source.complaint_what_happened:
I first contacted SANTANDER CONSUMER USA on XX/XX/XXXX regarding the insurance check I received from my insurance company, XXXX XXXX. The check is intended to repair my vehicle, which sustained hail damage during a recent storm in Colorado. 

Per their instructions, I mailed the check to the provided address, which I confirmed online, on XX/XX/XXXX. Upon calling them on XX/XX/XXXX, they confirmed receipt of the check. I requested Santander to endorse and return the check to me ; however, they informed me of a policy requiring checks over {$5000.00} to be sent directly to the repair shop. The representative advised me to email them at XXXX with my car 's VIN as the subject and include the repair shop details. I complied with these instructions, noted down during the call, and emailed them on XX/XX/XXXX, copying the repair shop and requesting the repair shop to provide Santander with any further needed information ; I also provided my phone number for direct contact. 

Despite this, they neither sent the check nor contacted me or the repair shop until I reached out on XX/XX/XXXX and XXXX. After an hour on hold, they claimed the check was not visible in their system. I insisted it was received, as confirmed by other representatives. Following another 30-minute hold, they acknowledged possession of the check but required verbal confirmation from the repair shop. I contacted the repair shop, and they called and confirmed the repair on my car, and it is ready for pick up. 

Even after the repair shop confirmed, Santander failed to send the check, requiring additional follow-up. Despite numerous calls from the repair shop and enduring hour-long waits, Santander continued to claim they were waiting for information from the repair shop, showing a lack of transparency. Additionally, I sent around 5-6 emails to Santander informing them that I had reached the maximum coverage from my insurance company for my rental and that I am now paying for the rental out of my own pocket. 
At this point, I'm uncertain about how to proceed to secure their endorsement on the check. Since Thursday, I've been covering the rental car expenses myself. The process they've outlined is ambiguous, we've submitted everything they require, yet their communication is non-existent. Continuously calling and waiting is not feasible for me. Just today, I missed a crucial meeting to stay on the line, and after an hour and twenty minutes, they picked up only to disconnect abruptly. When I called back and endured another hour 's wait, I requested to speak with their manager ( ID : XXXX ) and implored her to expedite the matter, as I need rental coverage while they sort out their procedures that began on XX/XX/XXXX.

NOTICE TO CEASE AND DESIST ALL COLLECTION ACTIVITIES! NOTICE OF REJECTION, REVOCATION AND TERMINATION OF ANY ASSUMPTION OF CONTRACT! NO CONTRACT AND NO CONSIDERATION! 
NOTICE TO AGENT IS NOTICE TO PRINCIPAL ; NOTICE TO PRINCIPAL IS NOTICE TO AGENT This letter shall be considered lawful notice that I hereby REJECT, REVOKE and TERMINATE of all security interest to you. Please consider the said contract paid in full and immediately release any and all encumbrances on account # XXXX. 

All prior Powers of Attorney, all other prior presumed or granted Executorships, Trust and Agency relationships are terminated! 


XXXX Civil liability. Civil liability for willful noncompliance. 15 U.S.C. 1681o - U.S. Code - Unannotated Title 15. Commerce and Trade 1681o. Civil liability for negligent noncompliance. 15 U.S. Code 1640 - Civil liability with respect to any failure to make disclosures. 15 U.S.C. 1611 - Criminal liability for willful and knowing violation. 

Any refutation of the aforementioned and/or the following issues must be done so, o and for the public record, in writing, by way of a sworn Affidavit, signed in their full XXXX name under penalties of the Law, including but not limited to perjury.

I request that you immediately CEASE and DESIST all actions with me. With this notice, under the law, you can now only contact me to : 1. To advise me that your company 's further efforts are being terminated ; 2. To notify me of remedies.
_source.sub_issue: Loan opened without my consent or knowledge

_source.complaint_what_happened: I bought a XXXX  from a 3rd party dealership on XX/XX/XXXX and XXXX  refuses to transfer the ownership to me. I bought the car XXXX hours from where I live in XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. The car isnt about to be used at XXXX  charging locations. Nor is it able to be moved. Its been parked at a mall parking lot in XXXXXXXX XXXX since XX/XX/XXXX. Ive contacted XXXX, the dealership, and the previous owners lien holding company ( XXXX  made me call them ). All for them to still not resolve the issue.
_source.issue: Problems at the end of the loan or lease

_source.complaint_what_happened: Creditor keeps calling my workplace after being told twice to not call my place of employment.

_source.complaint_what_happened: My issue lies with XXXX XXXX being predatory and dishonest. My interest rate on my XXXX loan was 23.99 % I have attached my contract which was the only contract I was ever given from the original lien holder XXXX XXXX back in XXXX of 2018. My loan was sold off to XXXX yet no other contract was ever given to me nor was there any mention of a Balloon payment at the end of my loan. My contract states that I owe XXXX each month for the life of the loan. I have been late many times with XXXX but was able to pay the late month payment along with a XXXX $ late payment fee to them. I was fine with that What I did not know was their dishonest ways of adding on 19 % each day my payment was late. This accrued to what became my balloon payment and was only explained to me by XXXX XXXX XXXX when I received the last statement letter that had the amount due of approx. XXXX $ I had no idea that this was protocol nor was it written or verbally explained to me that the additional daily late fees were in effect that resulted in a balloon payment. Throughout the XXXX  year loan my vehicle was repossessed twice and each time I managed to get it back by paying their high fees and towing expenses towing my truck almost XXXX miles from my house and the daily impound fee which added up since I couldn't get to my truck being so far away right away. I paid those fines and got my truck back Currently they repossessed my truck again because of my late payment on the ballon payment that they were demanding. I could only pay about XXXX $ each month to get the remaining amount down. It wasn't enough time. So after XXXX  years, I ended up paying over XXXX $ on a truck that was originally listed for XXXX XXXX Yet I have nothing to show for it now. And a negative mark on my credit report.
_source.company_public_response: Company believes it acted appropriately as authorized by contract or law

_source.complaint_what_happened: In XXXX of 2024, I was behind in my loan agreement and called to set up some payment arrangements. After talking with a supervisor, she set me up with an arrangement which consisted of a payment of {$340.00} for XXXX  months. I was in agreement and I had to pay {$25.00} to get this started, though it seemed odd because I had just paid them {$300.00} a few hours before. I have been continually making these payments for the last XXXX months and when I logged into my account I noticed that my payment arrangement was no longer showing on the account. I also noticed that they continue to charge me a {$13.00} late fee. I called them and wanted to know what was going on with my account and was told that I would have to do another arrangement and that even though I had just made a {$350.00} payment I would need to pay another XXXX to set this up.I asked to speak with a supervisor and was given the run around that they weren't available and they would call me back in XXXX to XXXX hours. This has happened before and the supervisor never returns the call and I have to call them back. With what they are doing my vehicle will not be paid off in the XXXX  months I was originally told it would be because though my monthly payment brings the balance down it goes up at the same time with the late fees they continue to charge. And I shouldn't have to pay an additional {$25.00} to make arrangements that were set back in XXXX because they say their arrangements are only for XXXX ( XXXX ) months though I wasn't told that in the beginning. I live on a fixed income of XXXX and I agreed to {$340.00} for XXXX  months not lets renew this every XXXX  months at an extra {$25.00} I don't have. That and they shouldn't continue to charge late fees that will put me past the XXXX  months to XXXX or XXXX at an additional cost of almost {$600.00}.
_source.company_public_response: Company has responded to the consumer and the CFPB and chooses not to provide a public response

I sent a letter to Santander bank in XXXX of 2024. Santander bank settled a lawsuit involving predatory lending and my car was purchased at the time of the lawsuit. My loan was complete, according to the lawsuit but Santander hangs up when I call and says they do not have a loan for me or any of my information. However they have a lien on the title of my car and the XXXX says they must fill out a XXXX release form so that I can get my title to my vehicle. 

( Santander XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX for {$550.00} XXXX ) https : XXXX

_source.complaint_what_happened: I have made numerous attempts to have Lincoln Automotive Financial Services to correct the inaccurate information that it continues to report to XXXX, XXXX, XXXX and XXXX. When I returned the auto lease, it was reported that I had no excessive miles. XXXX continues to charge reports a XXXX debt for mileage to the credit bureaus for the months of XXXX, and XX/XX/year>. Lincoln reported that it received its data from a third party data furnishers. I reported to Lincoln that I was a victim of identity theft and a data security breach. The referenced credit reporting bureaus have also been advised numerous times.

I am writing to formally lodge a complaint regarding the repossession of my vehicle on Saturday, XX/XX/year>. I am deeply distressed by the manner in which this repossession was conducted, as it was done without any prior notice, which is a clear violation of XXXX XXXX  state law. 

I have been making my auto loan payments regularly from my bank account. When I was notified that the payments were not received, I promptly sent out another payment. On XX/XX/year>, I spoke to a representative from your company who informed me that attempts were made to contact me regarding the missed payments. However, I did not receive any such communication, and the funds were indeed withdrawn from my account. 

Despite my efforts to rectify the situation, I was informed that I still owe {$2400.00}. According to XXXX XXXX XXXX law, a written notice of intent to repossess must be provided, which was not done in this case.
_source.company_public_response: Company has responded to the consumer and the CFPB and chooses not to provide a public response

Therefore, I urgently request the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ( CFPB ) to handle this matter directly, as the bank 's actions have resulted in significant harm to my financial well-being. The account is : NISSAN-INFINITI XXXX XXXX XXXX

On XX/XX/year> this truck was only XXXX at first site I paid over XXXX down payment which is against consumer transaction law code truth in lending act they went against 15 c Us 1662B there isnt or wasnt supposed to be no down payment no cash involved in a consumer transaction. THEY ALSO REPO THE CAR AFTER I GOT IN A BAC ACCIDENT THEY TOOK THE CAR WITH ALL MY PERSONAL ITEMS IN IT AN NEVER REACHED OUT TO RETURN IT PLUS THEY SOLD THE DEBT TO A LAWYER THAT CALLLED ME ASKING FOR A LOWER PRICE AND THEY WILL REMOVE THE FULL BALANCE THIS IS ALL FRAUD XXXX THEY PASSING MY INFORMATION AROUND WITH OUT MY PERMISSION

_source.complaint_what_happened:
I was ordered by divorce court to pay for the XXXX until XX/XX/XXXX. The XXXX was to be refinanced immediately but was not. I made every payment on time since XXXX the original loan and my only agreement with ALLY Bank. 
I called ALLY on after the order telling them the location of the car to repo because they would not be receiving payment from myself and the other party isn't going to pay. 
I called ALLY on a recorded line XX/XX/XXXX at XXXX XXXX  CST lasting XXXX mins XXXX seconds. I told ALLY repeatedly not to use my name and my credit to etend payments or change any payments to alter any loan with my name on it. To repo the car. 
ALLY was also told that it is a violation of my Constitutional Rights as an American and a Citizen of the United Nations. It is a basic human right to get what you pay for and only what you want. No person or company shall enter into a contract unlawfully without full permission. 

ALLY has used my name credit to drop my credit score, refinance the car to a lower payment still in my name. I forbid it. 
I want the XXXX refinanced out of my name immediately. {$5000.00} for violation of my RIghts and {$2500.00} weekly every week following the 15 days ALLY has to reply to the XXXX. 

I refused documents to alter loan. If my name has been acquired for a new loan ALLY will also prosecute the person reasonable with jail. 


XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX # XXXX
_source.sub_issue: Loan opened without my consent or knowledge

_source.complaint_what_happened:
I submitted instruments as tender of payment to the financial institution. Institution refuses to honor let alone comply and adhere to established laws.

I also am asking the institution if they collateralized the auto loan notes?

Did they sold or transfer the auto loan notes at any given time and if so, why wasn't I aware of the disclosure?

Will they swear under oath under penalty of perjury or affidavit of truth that they lend the money to me as the borrower? Also, that federal reserve notes is the only valid medium of exchange to tender payment of this alleged debt? Please provide the response under oath or affidavit of truth. Please provide the law or code you are using for the claims that you making. 

Please answer each one under oath

_source.complaint_what_happened:
On XX/XX/XXXX, I leased a vehicle through XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX from Ford XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, I called Ford XXXX to return the vehicle because I felt the weekly lease of {$430.00} was too high. XXXX in returns immediately told me that she could give me XXXX dollars off per week to bring the weekly lease down to XXXX. However, instead of me getting the XXXX discount XXXX in billing continued to charge me the regular price for the vehicle. I called an informed XXXX that she was overcharging me for the vehicle and her answer was XXXX dollars off the total price of the lease. I explained to XXXX that if you subtract XXXX dollars off XXXX it comes out to # XXXX. I called XXXX several times to inform her that I was being overcharged on the lease and she kept saying that those are paid invoices never giving me the proper credit for my payments. Nevertheless, I received a call from XXXX in the billing department asking me to return the lease on XX/XX/XXXX. I decided to email the manager XXXX and inform him that I did not owe Ford XXXX {$690.00}, and that XXXX was not giving me credit for my payments ( Attachment 1 ). 
Whenever I made a payment to Ford XXXX, they would give me a receipt of my payment. I provided the following information to the manager XXXX on XX/XX/XXXXXXXX XXXX and he emailed me back and he emailed me back on XX/XX/XXXX, and gave me all of these incorrect figures of what I owed to Ford XXXX ( attachment 2 ). 
I immediately, emailed XXXX back and sent him copies of all my Invoices, Receipts and bank statements to show the exact amount of money that I paid to Ford XXXX. XXXX email me and stated that he could not find a match for my payments receipt numbeXXXX XXXX XXXX and IXXXX XXXX Also, XXXX indicated matched by all of them except XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX. I provided XXXX with the following Invoices and the credit cards that each invoice was paid with, and he emailed me back with a bill that did not reflect what I paid to Ford XXXX. I emailed XXXX with my invoices, receipts and bank statements which shows my payments, and he email ; following and informed me that I still owed them {$690.00} ( see attachment 3 ) XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX card ending in XXXX matched XXXX XXXX  paid XX/XX/XXXX card ending in XXXX matched XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX card ending in XXXX matched IXXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXXXXXX XXXX  card ending in XXXX not found in our records, not found in the bank statement XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX card ending in XXXX matched XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX carding ending in XXXX matched XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX card ending in XXXX matched XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX card ending in XXXX not found in our records, not found in the bank statement XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX card ending in XXXX matched XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX card ending in XXXX not found in our records, not found in the bank statement Subsequently, XXXX emailed me back again and said, we regret the additional work, but while reviewing the information from our payment processor we found a payment dispute. Could you please take a look at the payment dispute that was made on XX/XX/XXXX for a payment made on XX/XX/XXXX? We do not have information from you about how the dispute occurred. We are interested in hearing your perspective about the reason for it. 
I emailed XXXX and provided him with the additional information and included receipts for XXXX XXXX  and XXXX XXXX  and my bank statements for XX/XX/XXXX to show that I paid XXXX XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX ; however XXXX applied my {$490.00} payment that I made on XX/XX/XXXX to XXXX XXXX and I have already made the payment on XX/XX/XXXX for XXXX XXXX XXXX Attachment 5 ). Please see the following : XXXX XXXX paid XX/XX/XXXX with Card Ending in XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX  paid XX/XX/XXXX with Card Ending in XXXX Also, I went into my bank XXXX XXXX and obtained a copy of my bank statement and obtain the bankers card for XXXX to call the bank so they could inform him that on the day that I made the payment to Ford XXXX does not post until the next business day. Also, I emailed XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX, and I explained to XXXX that I asked XXXX to break down XXXX XXXX  ( see attachment 4 ) and she created the following XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX : I have attached the invoices, receipts and bank statements for XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX which matches my bank statements. XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX both show the date that I paid which was XX/XX/XXXXXXXX card ending XXXX and the bank statement shows the day the payment posted to my account on XX/XX/XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX both show the day I paid was XX/XX/XXXX, card ending in XXXX and the bank statement shows the payment posted to my account on XX/XX/XXXX ( Attachment 4 ). Afterwards on the same day XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX emailed me back and thank me for the additional payment details and information ; but it will take a while, but we want you to know that we received them and we will look into the information ( attachment 6 ) Nevertheless, even though I provided this proof of my payments with receipts and bank statements on XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX never emailed me back with the status of my payments, On Friday XX/XX/XXXX, I paid the new invoice for the current week and I was still waiting to hear back from XXXX in reference to the additional information that I provided him ( Attachment 7 ) On Tuesday XX/XX/XXXX while I was charging the vehicle a towing company came to repossess the vehicle. I called Ford XXXX and asked to speak to XXXX ; but he refused to get on the phone and just told the representative XXXX to repossess the car. XXXX was wrong and totally unprofessional to not even look into the information that I provided him which shows proof that I dont owe Ford XXXX the XXXX XXXXXXXX and XXXX are trying to steal the money that I paid to Ford XXXX and this is unfair and shows total dishonesty on behalf of a XXXX Ford Motor company that is under Ford Motor Corporation.
_source.sub_issue: Loan balance remaining after the vehicle is repossessed and sold

_source.complaint_what_happened:
On XX/XX/XXXX, I went to return my leased XXXX XXXX XXXX. It was due on XXXX met with the XXXX ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, FL ) to turn in the lease vehicle and he informed that I will have to pay the disposition fee unless I purchase or lease a new vehicle. We discussed my budget and desired vehicle. He then went to check the inventory and came with an option to buy a new vehicle that I agreed to purchase and finalized the transaction. During the transaction, he confirmed to me that there will be no disposition fee and it will also be clearly mentioned in the grounding receipt. I received the grounding receipt the next day ( XX/XX/XXXX ) and I noticed that the " Vehicle Disposition '' section was not filled correctly. I immediately wrote to XXXX and he confirmed to me that there will be no disposition fee. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, I received a statement from NAMC ( Nissan Motor Acceptance Company ) with disposition fee. I sent it to XXXX and have gone back and forth by email with him as well as NAMC. Per XXXX, NAMC will remove the disposition fee " ONLY '' if I call, which I did 3 times but NAMC agents tell me that it's in the process of being removed and should not take this long. It has not been removed to date.
_source.issue: Problems at the end of the loan or lease
_source.sub_issue: Excess mileage, damage, or wear fees, or other problem after the lease is finished

_source.complaint_what_happened:
This is a formal statement notifying Carmax that the accounts under name are disputed. 
The vehicle in question was purchased on or about [ XXXX XXXX ], financed by [ Carmax ], repossessed in the state of [ Washington XXXX DC ], and sold by ( Carmax ] on or about [ XX/XX/year> ]. 
Under the laws of [ Washington, Dc ] and UCC 9.506 as well as State RISA and MVISA statutes, a deficiency can not be claimed unless all of the required notices were properly and timely given, and all of the allowable redemption and cure time limits were adhered to. 
I demand proof that the repossession of the subject vehicle was legal in accordance with the following UCC : 9-506. EFFECT OF ERRORS OR OMISSIONS. 
$ 9-611. NOTIFICATION BEFORE DISPOSITION OF COLLATERAL 9-612. TIMELINESS OF NOTIFICATION BEFORE DISPOSITION OF COLLATERAL.

9-613. CONTENTS AND FORM OF NOTIFICATION BEFORE DISPOSITION OF COLLATERAL You are required to provide me with copies of the legal notices and proof of the commercially reasonable manner of the notification and resale of the subject vehicle. 
If no such proof is provided within 15 days from receipt of this complaint, the alleged claim of a deficiency will be considered null and void, and any continued collection activities, or continued reporting of this invalid claim on my credit reports will be considered a violation of the FDCPA and FCRA.
_source.sub_issue: Loan balance remaining after the vehicle is repossessed and sold

_source.complaint_what_happened: I have paid off the bank of america loan for the car payment for XXXX XXXX XXXX  I overpaid by {$5000.00}. Can you please ask the bank to send back my {$5000.00} overpayment> thanks XXXX XXXX and please have it showing paid in full XXXX balance.

_source.complaint_what_happened: XX/XX/XXXX - made a payment, talked with a rep and told her i would make next payment however days later was repo after only missing 2 payments due to not working during covid XX/XX/XXXX - took the car refused to give it back ( i have the title to the car, they said they would wipe of credit etc ) XX/XX/XXXX went to the lot were car was cuz my things were inside and I was told that this car was sold!!!! It was only a day after i tried to get the car back XX/XX/XXXX XX/XX/XXXX XX/XX/XXXX Ive been disputing this for two years! This was an unlawful repo! After paying a XXXX deposit

_source.complaint_what_happened: I went to XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX  on XX/XX/year> to purchase a car XXXX  XXXX. I met with XXXX XXXX associate XXXX and we sat down and talked about the car I wanted. After that I Made a presentment and showed him My written affidavit for Credit application settlement through Transfer of endorsed certificate, and he had said he has never received anything like it and they had their own credit application. I told him I would like to get a car through acquisition and a XXXX he said he would need bank statements to show credentials of the funds I have. I proceeded to state that the money would come out of my social security XXXX  account and that I was performing my obligation to pay and I applied for the credit application and am exercising my rights of good faith. He stated that this was only going to go XXXX way and that was through the bank which I would get a loan from and they would run my credit to see which bank would approve me for a loan. He also told me I was considering putting a down payment and I had told him no this was a consumer credit transaction. After that We did my credit application and he told me that XXXX Banks accepted my application out of the many he ran my credit with, and that I would have to put at least XXXX $ to get the car off the lot. I told him I'm not putting a down payment. He insisted I ask someone to trade their car in, I blatantly told him no and he said if there's anything else I need Feel free to call him. I told him he will hear from me within a week.

On XX/XX/year>, I traded in my new XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX that I had recently purchased from XXXX XXXX XXXX because it was a XXXX. Instead of going through legal matters, XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX the finance XXXX agreed to give me {$23000.00} of trade-in allowance with an additional {$3000.00} cash from me and promised that the owed finance amount and monthly payments would be less than the XXXX I XXXX trading-in. So, I proceeded to go through the process of acquiring the new financing for the XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Sport with XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX. I repeatedly asked him about the owed finance amount through the process of XXXX  the documents, XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX assured me again that it would be less than the XXXX XXXX I was trading-in. Upon completing the paperwork, I asked XXXX XXXX XXXX for a copy of all documents on a XXXX XXXX. XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX assured me that everything was on the XXXX XXXX. A few days later, XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX called me and asked for me to come to the dealership because we had to change lenders. Upon arriving, I found out that I would be financing through Suncoast again. I asked was there any changes in the contract before I signed anything, which he assured me that everything was the same. Upon completing the XXXX, I asked for a copy of all the documents on a XXXX XXXX and physically signed a form giving Suncoast authorization for automatic withdrawal from my checking account. XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX thanked me and said the copy of my XXXX  would be mailed to me. I have yet to receive any documents from XXXX in reference to the revised finance agreement and was never given a copy of the original sales contract. After months of delay and receiving past due payment notices from Suncoast for the XXXX XXXX loan, I reached out to XXXX and Suncoast. I never received a reply from XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX but was able to reach a loan XXXX at Suncoast. She informed me that the original loan had not yet been paid off from XXXX and that was the reason I was receiving payment past due notices. She put in a payment extension for me and advised that I contact XXXX. A few days after, I received a phone call from XXXX XXXX department informing me that XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX was no longer working there, and the associate was finalizing the deal for him. He asked what my method of payment was, in which I informed him it was XXXX XXXX. I also took the time to explain to him the entire situation, so he would understand the nature of the agreement. He said that he understood and assured me that everything was being handled. On XX/XX/year>, a new loan notice was issued to me from Suncoast for an extensive amount. On XXXX XXXX, an unauthorized electronic transaction was made to my XXXX XXXX checking account by XXXX for {$3000.00} that had already been paid with my XXXX XXXX card, which is entailed on a separate complaint. Through this entire scandal I've been manipulated, undermined, and XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX This is a clear case of culpable negligence and a violation of consumer protection laws.

Dear Navy Federal Credit Union, I am having trouble recognizing this account that is being reported on my credit report. I do not think it belongs to me and so I am asking for your company to validate this account information by providing me with the requested documentation. In the event that you are unable to do so, then you must cease all reporting of this account immediately.

_source.complaint_what_happened: My name is XXXX XXXX and I'm filing a complaint against Nissan Motor Acceptance Corp, XXXX, XXXX, and XXXX for continuing to report this inaccurate information on my credit report regarding a balance of {$6100.00} as a charge off on account # # XXXX. According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act law code 15 U.S. Code 1681s2 A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate. I have documentation that its inaccurate information is still showing on all of my credit reports on XXXX, as of XX/XX/2024 and my records show Nissan Motor Acceptance could not validate the debt from which they stated to me in a letter with their letterhead. I also have documentation that Nissan Motor Acceptance Corp was not my lien holder. The correct lien holder was XXXX XXXX and the account number was XXXX. I'm requesting this inaccurate information including but not limited to late payments to be completely and permanently removed from all 3 credit bureaus including XXXX, XXXX, and XXXX.
_source.sub_issue: Loan balance remaining after the vehicle is repossessed and sold

_source.complaint_what_happened: On XX/XX/year> i was approved for a car loan with ally bank. My credit score is XXXX and for some reason my interest rate they charged me is 22 %. Im a young XXXX XXXX guy and i feel as though they have discriminated against me because of my XXXX. When i asked why my interest rate was so high, no one at ally bank could give me an answer.

Mercades benz financial has sent someone in the middle of the night to repo my car, they violated my rights below along with the repo company. 

Violations Cited : False and Misleading Information : According to 15 USC 1611, providing false or misleading information about the cost or terms of credit is illegal. I believe there were inaccuracies and/or misleading information provided at the time of signing the lease agreement, specifically related to the sum of all charges, including undisclosed insurance fees and other fraudulent transactions. 

Failure to Disclose Terms : Under the Truth in Lending Act ( TILA ), there were violations regarding the proper disclosure of finance charges and terms, constituting fraud. 

Illegal Repossession : Under 15 USC 1692 ( a ) and ( f ), it is illegal to repossess property through non-judicial actions not ordered by a court or judge. The recent repossession of my vehicle was not sanctioned by any court order, making it unlawful. Furthermore, I conducted business with Mercedes-Benz , not the tow company that took my property without legal grounds, constituting a breach of peace and unauthorized repossession. 

Invasion of Privacy and Identity Theft : As per 15 USC 6802 ( a ) and ( c ), disclosing personal information to a non-affiliated third party without written consent or without providing a clear opt-out option is prohibited. There was no written authorization from me to disclose my information to the third-party tow company, which constitutes an invasion of privacy and identity theft. 

Unfair, Deceptive, or Abusive Acts or Practices : There have been violations of sections 1031 and 1036 of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act ( Dodd-Frank Act ) regarding prohibitions on engaging in unfair, deceptive, or abusive acts or practices when repossessing vehicles. The actions taken by your company in repossessing my vehicle fall under these violations.

XX/XX/XXXX innovate loan financing secured a loan for my auto ..for my XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  documentation showing my balance interest rate payments madebilling is completely incorrect and not posted appropriately Almost 2 years later theyre showing my balance of being the same as my original loan amount.. I called to make my payment early last month and The recording said I was XXXX payments past due - incorrect, I was paying early & not past due period.. I called and spoke to a rep he said the recording was wrong. His records show I am current I asked him to send me proof while we were on the phone, he advised he had no way to do this I asked to speak to supervisor & he said there were no supervisors at the moment supervisors had left the building. He assured he has supervisor would be emailing me information I requested. Never received anyhtning I sent an email asking for this information No Response XX/XX/XXXX I called in asking for statement, Advise them I have never received a statement. They told me the computer and their entire companies mainframe crashed. Advised me they had no way of getting into any records. I kept calling monthly told same thingXXXX months later, Im still asking for the same statement I was told the system was still down.. To this date have never received a statement or any documentation to show my balances, any kind of documentation to show payments made interest my concern is I keep making my payments early & I have no way to see what my interest is being charged or any kind of breakdown and their record says that I am late which I was not so theyre overcharging.. 

You have to go online to make a A payment they have no information available no access to statements, no interest rate info no balance info nothing. 

XX/XX/XXXX they kept returning & rejecting my payment online. I had to keep resending it over and over, making sure my payment was made. 

They refuse to send a monthly statement showing current balance, interest, payments made. I request a monthly statement every month and they refuse... I told him if you wont mail one out email me one they refuse I have called and requested over 33 times for this information and still get the runaround. Im told they will email it.. I received one email and all I had was a list of my payments. I had no interest-rate and no breakdown. I had no balance no payoff no anything. 

They pray on people needing help taking advantage especially during Covid.. my grandmother passed away, and I had to go home take care of my XXXX XXXX XXXX grandfather.. My credit score was not that bad but not a XXXX preyed on people in need during Covid. 

They take advantage by not giving the consumer any information that I would think by law we are to have.. I would like to know where I on a monthly basis I am not the only complaint there are thousands of complaints
I have a car loan with santander consumer usa my social XXXX reason for my complaint they refused to put me on an extension im one payment due i recently made a payment on XXXX XXXX
XXXX XXXX XXXX  and XXXX XXXX have me as a repo on all platforms making it hard for me to get a car. Which I sued the company for repossession my car when I never was late for any payments
_source.company_public_response: Company has responded to the consumer and the CFPB and chooses not to provide a public response

_source.complaint_what_happened:
On XX/XX/2024, I purchased a vehicle from XXXX TX, XXXX. During the transaction, several significant issues arose, leading me to believe the contract was executed under unfair and deceptive practices : Misrepresentation of Payment Terms : The down payment amount was discussed as being between {$2000.00} and {$4000.00} during text message exchanges with the sales representative. However, I was charged {$3000.00} at the point of sale, which was not clearly communicated beforehand. 
The monthly payment was vaguely described as a " low {$500.00} payment, '' but the final amount was {$460.00} for 72 months. The exact payment terms were not disclosed until the point of signing. 
Failure to Disclose Finance Charges and Use of High-Pressure Sales Tactics : The interest rate of 24.10 % and a total finance charge of {$15000.00} were not disclosed during the negotiation process. These terms were only revealed at the point of signing, where I was pressured to complete the paperwork quickly. 


The documents were signed late in the evening as the dealership was closing. The rapid succession of signatures, combined with the late hour, created a high-pressure environment in which I was not given sufficient time to review the terms thoroughly. 
Pre-Population of County Selection : The `` County of Title Issuance '' form was pre-populated with XXXX XXXX without my input. I was not given the opportunity to select the appropriate county for title issuance, which is required by law. 
Unjustifiable Denial of Credit and Predatory Lending Practices : Violation : The high-pressure tactics used to finalize the contract and the lack of transparency about the finance charges and terms may indicate predatory lending practices. 

Applicable Law : Texas Predatory Lending Law, Texas Business and Commerce Code 2.302, and the Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC ) require transparency and fairness in all credit transactions. Contracts signed under duress or under deceptive practices are voidable under Texas law. 

Undisclosed Additional Charges : Charges for a Service Contract ( {$2200.00} ) and Appearance Protection ( {$640.00} ) were added to the final amount financed without proper disclosure or my explicit consent. 
Excessive and Undisclosed Documentary Fee : A documentary fee of {$150.00} was included in the transaction without clear disclosure. 
Due to these issues, the contract was executed in violation of federal and Texas state laws, including the Texas Deceptive Trade Practices Act ( DTPA ) and the Truth in Lending Act ( TILA ). I am seeking the rescission of the contract, a refund of my {$3000.00} down payment, and the removal of charges related to the additional products. 

These practices have caused significant distress, and I request prompt resolution to avoid further action. Due to the excessively high interest rate of 24.10 %, I am unable to afford the monthly car payments. This financial burden has also led to my denial of employment opportunities, further exacerbating the situation.

I have had this car loan for a little over two years. My recent unemployment has made it difficult to keep up. Im finally current, but have hundreds in fees ( also paid ). Some of the returned payment fees were also not my fault, as I was unaware my bank closed my Account. Im just a desperate soul in need of a little assistance and Chase is bouncing me around. One rep told me he processed a refund of 3 late fees and any return payment fees, but that was never done and of course, theres no record of it. If calls are recorded, it should be pulled.

The contractual date began in XXXX of 2018. It was approximately XXXX months later, I noticed there were additional fees being applied. I called and wrote Ally on a consistent basis. Working to resolve the discrepancies. Honestly, there are so many I had and/or have a hard time keeping up with them. 

I have come up with a minimum of {$48.00} in the number of overpayments. 

In reviewing the amounts today, the number is adding a {$690.00} amount. 

Additionally, there were fees and charges made to my personal checking account in excess of {$300.00} not recovered! 

Beware of Ally they also close personal accounts with no explanation.

On XX/XX/XXXX, I requested a payoff. The payoff provided from their website did not ask anything about where the car was being traded, or purchased. A pay off through XX/XX/XXXX was provided in the amount of {$32000.00}.

On XXXX, Honda/Acura Financial Services received the payoff check in the amount of {$32000.00} from XXXX XXXX XXXX ( the dealer we traded the vehicle in to ). This was confimred by the tracking information, as well as confirmed by phone from one of the representatives I spoke with. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, I had heard nothing from Honda/Acura Financial Services , so I reached out to them. I was told my payoff was short {$370.00} ( taxes and lease termination fee ). I called and spoke with the dealership, then called back and paid the {$370.00} that day just to get the loan paid off as I didn't want it to negatively impact my credit. The representative could not clearly explain nor tell me where in the contract it stated they could hold a payoff/payment to may account, nor could he explain why I had to pay the lease termination fee per contract. He just kept telling me that was how it worked, but couldn't point me to where it said that. He assured me that in 3 days ( could have been 3-4 or something like that, but I heard 3 for sure ) it would be fully paid off and reflected on my account. 

My account with Honda/Acura Financial Services reflects the XXXX was posted to my account on XX/XX/XXXX. But the payoff still has yet to be posted and it was received 5 days prior to the additional {$370.00} they demanded I pay. 

Since then, I have called them multiple times to inquire about when my loan would be paid off and the loan payoff would be posted. It is now XX/XX/XXXX, and the loan payment/payoff still hasn't been posted. I called them on XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, and twice on XX/XX/XXXX. Everyone of the times I have called, I have been told it would be 3 days, or 1-3 days ( on the most recent call ). They have been saying 3 days since XX/XX/XXXX. Each day I have called, I have requested multiple time to speak to a manager, to which I am told they can't transfer me. I have asked to speak to the department who posts the payments, and was told they can't transfer the call and don't even have the ability to transfer calls to anyone. 

On XX/XX/XXXX I spent 53 minutes on the phone, most of it on hold, for the representive to try to figure out where in the contract it stated that they could hold the payment/payoff, and where it stated that I could not trade the vehicle to a dealer outside of Honda/Acura with out paying the lease termination fee. I have leased cars for many years now, and have always traded in the vehicles and never had to deal with anything like this. 

Also, on XX/XX/XXXX, I asked why no one had informed me that the payoff was put on hold and not being posted, he told me that was my problem to figure it out, and they weren't going to notify me. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, the dealership contacted Honda/Acura Financial Services , they were told that it would be posted to the account tomorrow ( XX/XX/XXXX ) but would take a few days to reflect to my account and stated Monday was a Holiday, so I needed to call on Tuesday to see if it had been posted. The dealership asked why it had not been applied yet, and was told they had no idea.

I and the dealership should not have to keep calling every day to see if this has posted, to kept being told a few days, 1-3 days, or 3 days. 

I get daily calls from Honda/Acura Financial Services , harrassing me to make my payment. This begun on XX/XX/XXXX after I called and I am still receiving this call every day. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, 4 days after they received my payoff, a late fee was accessed to my account. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, a manager from Acura did finally call back, she stated the payoff would be completed today XX/XX/XXXX. I asked her where in the contract it stated about holding payoffs and where it stated I can't trade to another dealer. She said that in the contract it doesn't state they can hold payments/payoffs. As far as the lease termination fee, she said in section XXXX of the contract. When I pushed back and said I didn't end the lease or return the vehicle, it was purchased, she kept telling me that section addressed me not being able to sell/trade to another dealer, when I asked her to show me where, not just tell me I couldn't she could not do that. This was on a call that she did tell me was being recorded. She said if you decide to go through an outside dealer, you are charged more. She kept saying it was in section XXXX, but couldn't tell me where it stated that trading to a dealer/dealer purchasing it I would be charged {$370.00}. She also referenced section XXXX, but it didn't say that either. She said section XXXX, but that is the turn in fee, it wasn't turned in. She again assured me initially that I could see it was paid off today, but then said it would be tomorrow. By end end of the call, she stated it was paid off on their end. She stated there was no overage, even though there was 4 days extra added to the payoff.

_source.complaint_what_happened: santander consumer usa in 2020 finance a vehicle to me {$30000.00} 18.54 % {$20000.00} and my down payment of {$3300.00} the total amount financed {$53000.00} the vehicle been repossess i have got it back hidden fees on the account and now the account is charged off with a balance of {$13000.00} and cant do nothing about it my balance was going up and down and dont no why one year had it down to {$21000.00} i was late on my payments it changed balance up to {$23000.00} dont know why im tired of it and it on order report right now

For one thing by the law I was not supposed to be charged XXXX for a down payment on a car that was told to me was only XXXX by 15 usc 1662B TRUTH OF LENDING ACT no cash should not been involved in my consumer transaction BUT XXXX  XXXX AND SANTANDER DID SOME TYPE OF BUSINESS WITH MY INFORMATION WITH OUT MY SOLE PERMISSION TO GET ME THE HIGHEST Interest rate they could come up with its unfair and against the law Truth

_source.complaint_what_happened: I purchased a vehicle from company back in XXXX, over five years ago. I owed {$4500.00} on the vehicle, unfortunately due to financial hardships the car was reposed the car was placed to be reauctioned, I requested to pay the amount owed. Lobel told me I cant and I need to pay the amount due. a year later, I contacted lobel again to see if I can pay a lump some payment to remove account in negative balance, again lobel told me no. the car was then resold auction and no documentation was ever provided upon my request. I requested to pay the difference at the time, lobel told me no once again. lobel did not want to come to agreement regarding account. lobel then proceed to report to my credit companies inaccurate and false amount owed on account stating i owed {$9400.00}, which is incorrect. lobel financial had a class action lawsuit against them for the fraudulent reporting 's and accounts. somehow they still want to report to credit company and keep harassing me via family members
_source.sub_issue: Loan balance remaining after the vehicle is repossessed and sold

_source.complaint_what_happened: I mailed a check clearly marked LOAN PRINCIPAL to Capital One Auto Finance. This was intended to be an additional payment towards the principal on the loan, not included as part of the monthly minimum. The account is current and has never been late. This " financial institution '' blatantly ignored my instructions as to how to apply this check and chose to apply it to the INTEREST instead.
They are violating 15 u.s. code 1681 s 2 please remove this negative item from my credit report. Thank you.

_source.complaint_what_happened: Back in XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX my car payment of {$1200.00} was taken out of my account for bmw finance. Then days later it was returned back to my account. I called bmw finance to ask why was the amount sent back to my account and the representative stated that they dont show it being put back and that the note for that month was paid. Found out almost a year later that the note for that month was never paid and I had been charged late fees every month for a year. I never received a call, email, physical mail of any sort saying I was late. I paid my note regularly every month not having a clue I was getting charged late fees. Finally was able to get that revolved XXXX of last year. Now I have 17 late payments showing on my credit from this lack of communication. While the whole time I paid my car note on time, not being aware of the late fees.
The car has been paid off for a few years and it's still on my credit report

_source.complaint_what_happened: I have spoken with Flagship Credit on numerous occasions regarding their billing and their application of payments towards my loan. Their predatory methods are extremely distasteful. Ive been paying XXXX on a XXXX XXXX XXXX. The payoff currently is approximately {$34000.00} which is roughly more then when i even first purchased the vehicle. Ive been paying on the same vehicle since XXXX. The amount of late fees due to the company 1. ) not processing a due date change and 2. ) telling me the due date initially something different. Over 3 years of paying on a car and its no where near the value and also the unfair deceptive practices are despicable.

_source.complaint_what_happened: I just checked my report and realized credit acceptance has listing the fraudulent account as late even after the repossession. It shows on my account that the vehicle has been late every month. That there is XXXX late payment. And XXXX  hasnt owned the car for XXXX  months. After that repossession there was no agreement in place to pay anything monthly. So whats late? They still have the full balance showed on my credit report. But to mark something late after an account was closed and there wasnt an agreement to pay is straight up illegal! Also there were belongings left in the vehicle worth a lot of money me or XXXX  never retrieved due to towing agency saying accusing me making threats I was told all our belongings was thrown away. So how will we be reimbursed for all the belongings taken and thrown away

I was told I had a final payment on my loan. When I called Chase Auto on XX/XX/year> at XXXX and XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX to find out the balance, Chase refused to give me that information. 

They also locked me out of my account and refuse to let me sign in and view this information on my own. 

They also lied regarding fees and at this stage will be reporting the finance institution federally and to other agencies. 

I should not be denied this information as its illegal!

My wallet was either lost or stolen and my identity was later used to open several fraudulent accounts..I did not know about these accounts until about XXXX or XXXX later.. I contacted the police and filed a report asap back in XXXX of XXXX when I was made aware of these accounts and have been fighting this since

My vehicle was repossessed due to a default in the auto loan with Fulton Bank since XX/XX/XXXX. There has been numerous communications with the lender on options of getting caught up on the loan. The reason for default was due to an unexpected loss of employment since XX/XX/XXXX. Once I gained employment on XX/XX/XXXX, I stuck to my good faith communication of making a payment on my first pay check at XX/XX/XXXX, in which I did for the amount of {$750.00} which should have resolved the payment from XX/XX/XXXX in the amount of {$40.00} and the XX/XX/XXXX loan amount of {$640.00}. The vehicle was repossessed 6 days later. When I called the lender to inquire on the details of getting the vehicle back into my possession, the authorized representative had advised that the entire balance of the loan ( pay off amount ) needed to be paid, in addition to the repossession fees. I was told that I may be a liability of a future repossession and that was something the bank did not want to deal with. I was also told that I have been late on my loan since XXXX, in which I had disagreed because the loan payments has always been an ACH from my banking account. When I refused to accept their terms, they immediately set the vehicle up for an auction without giving another option or another look into my disputed claims. Furthermore, the towing company that was used to reposses the vehicle is in another state from which I live and I can not retrieve my personal belongings due to the distance and the office hours of the towing company.
_source.company_public_response: Company has responded to the consumer and the CFPB and chooses not to provide a public response
_source.sub_issue: Account reinstatement or redemption after repossession
